text: Acetaldehyde (systematic name ethanal) is an organic compound with the chemical formula . One of the simplest aldehydes, it is important in both biology and the chemical industry. == Preparation == Acetaldehyde can be made by oxidation of ethylene or ethanol. It was historically made by the addition of water to acetylene. == Biology == Acetaldehyde is produced when the body breaks down ethanol. Acetaldehyde in the body is a major cause of hangover symptoms. Category:Aldehydes
title: Acetaldehyde
